duties_responsibilities.duty: Review, analyze, and process accounts payable, bank reconciliations, and claim-related tasks.
Correspond with debtors, collection attorneys, and Association’s collection agency TSI.
Process attorney bills for PIP judgment litigation and judgment revivals.
Manage daily banking responsibilities, including ACH Claimants, voiding checks, and transferring funds.
Prepare monthly bank reconciliations and process attorney bills.

education_certification.credential: Associates degree with emphasis in accounting or high school diploma with equivalent work experience
